profile:
GasGuys.ca Inc. specialize in residential installation of Natural Gas line systems and appliances. We offer fast, friendly service at competitive pricing.
We treat you and your home with care, listen to your issues, and focus on the problems.
Our Services offered include:
Enbridge Red Tag corrections, Gas Leak repairs as well as Natural Gas Line installation for the following appliances - BBQ, Cook Tops, Stoves, Ovens, Outdoor Fire Pits, Patio Heaters and Hayward pool heaters.

We respect our trade and abide by the CSA B149 code book. We value everyone’s safety and stand behind our quality workmanship. 

Our commitment to you is backed by a 5 year GasGuys Guarantee.  
Should we discover a leak on the work we performed, we will gladly repair it and credit you the full labor portion of the job up to $500.   

**This guarantee is applicable to any portion of gas line installed by our team.  **Physical or environmental damages affecting the original installation are excluded. **Should we come out to investigate a leak and prove it is not on our work, the visit will be subject to a service fee.
Thank you for your patronage,
GasGuys.ca Inc.

profile:
Air In Motion Heating + Cooling is an established company with a proven track record. We specialize in comfort solutions and also respond quickly to no heating calls, no cooling calls, leaking water heaters, and we service and install furnaces, air conditioners, water heaters, thermostats, indoor air quality products resolving indoor air quality issues or problems with mould, ventilation and other indoor air common problems. We have 17 years of experience in this industry and deliver the best quality workmanship. Any HVAC Issues big or small Air In Motion Heating + Cooling is the company to call. We also have a Master Electrician and a Certified Plumber on staff as well to help you with any issues you have with your electrical or plumbing needs at home from replacing electrical panels, safety inspections, replacing toilets, sinks, fixing leaks or installing hot water tanks to boiler systems.

   “ All electrical work is subcontracted to ECRA/ESA Licensed Electrical Contractors. "

profile:
Five Lions Heating & Cooling is a Toronto based company. We are independently owned and operated. At Five Lions Heating & Cooling we specialize in air quality solutions in your home. Whether residential or commercial we provide services in installations, repairs and maintenance.
We extend our HVAC services throughout the GTA and even further! Five Lions Heating & Cooling is available 7 days a week, 24 hours a day. We’re dedicated and committed in completing all our job duties. We find solutions and the right fit for better air quality. Our priority is in making our customers happy and comfortable in any space.


When you choose Five Lions Heating & Cooling, we strive to make you feel confident that you’re getting the highest quality in both products and service. We’re committed to delivering complete customer satisfaction in everything we do.


Five Lions Heating & Cooling is fully licensed and operates under the Technical Standards & Safety Authority (TSSA). We also carry 2 million liability insurance. Protecting our customers to ensure safety is very important us. Our professional HVAC team is highly qualified and experienced in installations and repairs. Five Lions Heating & Cooling, is a company that you can count on to service all your residential and commercial needs.

profile:
Royalty Air Systems has been providing heating, air conditioning, and air quality systems and installation services in the Greater Toronto area for 20 years.

With 20 years of experience providing the absolute best in Air Conditioning and Heating Service, we maintain a tradition of quality, value and excellent customer service.

Regardless of how small or large the project, our customers can rest assured that they will receive attentive, personalized service – something you just don’t get from companies owned by corporate conglomerates.

Since opening shop in 2000, the secret to our success and longevity has been to keep serving our customers faster, better and always at a fair price.

profile:
Founded nearly over twenty years ago, Sareena Heating & Cooling has been proudly serving the region of Toronto and the Greater Area, with licensed and registered technicians ready to troubleshoot, service and install anything and everything HVAC. As we are Homestar Verified, you can rest easy knowing all of our technicians are fully licensed and certified to work on gas and propane units. With a wealth of experience, we offer a comfortable journey for you through the entire process, leaving you with a home as clean as when we arrived. 

Whether you are a homeowner looking to upgrade, repair your existing unit, or a contractor looking to finish a renovation with ductwork, we are fully equipped and ready to meet your needs. While we are new to HomeStars, we are not new to providing our customers with a long lasting solution to their comfort sources. 

We are happy to service, maintain or install any of the following comfort products - don't see a product or service? Message us!
- Air Conditioning
- Furnaces
- Fireplaces 
- Ductless
- Ductwork
- Gas BBQs
-Pool Heaters
and more!
